elements.title: cover-up tattoos (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that some cover-up tattoos incorporate scars into their designs (example pictured)?

elements.title: Ibrahim al-Imam (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Ibrahim al-Imam secretly orchestrated the Abbasid Revolution that toppled the Umayyad Caliphate, but was captured and died in prison shortly before the Abbasid army defeated the Umayyads?

elements.title: Stewards Society (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Stewards Society is an all-male secret society at Georgetown University?

elements.title: Robert Winterberg (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that in 1906, composer Robert Winterberg gave a concert for the queen of Romania?

elements.title: learn from human feedback (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that artificial intelligence models like ChatGPT can learn from human feedback?

elements.title: Joey Siu (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that activist Joey Siu is the first US citizen to be declared a fugitive under the Hong Kong national security law?

elements.title: Dress (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that "Dress" was described as "the perfect marriage of [Taylor] Swift's romanticism and newfound lust"?

elements.title: Kobe Bufkin (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that as a sophomore Kobe Bufkin was the youngest member of the 2022–23 Michigan Wolverines?

elements.title: an era of ship wars (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a "pedophilic" relationship between two fictional adults led to an era of ship wars?
